title: Amazing Stories Volume 12 Number 03
creator: Palmer, Raymond Alfred, 1910-1977

description: Amazing Stories, volume 12, number 3 (June 1938). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Ziff-Davis Publishing Company and edited by Raymond A. Palmer. Periodical copyright not renewed. Most individual contributions' copyrights not renewed; one story redacted as still under copyright. This magazine and the remainder of its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: The Man Who Ruled the World (Robert Moore Williams), Escape Through Space (Ross Rocklynne), The Master of Golden City (John Russell Fearn), The Vanishing Diamonds (Charles R. Tanner), A Summons from Mars (John Russell Fearn), and The Invisible Bomber (Ralph Milne Farley).
